          <title>
            <string language="no">Forstørrelsesglass</string>
            <string language="en">Magnifying glass</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vergrößerungsglas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Loupe</string>

          </title>
          <language>no</language>
          <description>
            <string language="no">Hva skjer i et forstørrelsesglass?
Hvorfor ser ting større ut?</string>
            <string language="en">What happens in a magnifying glass? Why does things look bigger?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">lupe</string>
            <string language="en">lupe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">forstørrelsesglass</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was geschieht in einem Vergrößerungsglas? 
Warum der grössere Sacheblick?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Que se produit dans une loupe ? Pourquoi le 
sembler de choses plus grand ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que acontece em um vidro ampliando? Por que
o olhar das coisas mais grande?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa accade in una lente d'ingrandimento? 
Perchè il sembr di cose più grande?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό που συμβαίνει σε ένα ενισχύοντας γυαλί; 
Γιατί τα πράγματα φαίνονται μεγαλύτερα;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Qué sucede en una lupa? ¿Por qué  la 
mirada de las cosas más grande?</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">lupe</string>
          </keyword>
